JavaAssignment.View

Class Displayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaAssignment.View.Displayer

  • public class Displayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Prepare to display selected operation output in resultsArea based on data from input areas: matrix TextArea and vector TextArea.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Displayer(Matrix toDisplay, java.lang.String[] vector, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> vectorArray, LUDecomposition LUDisplay)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Prepare matrix from matrix input TextArea to display in output TextArea.
      java.lang.String displaySolution(int operation)
      Display solution in results TextArea of selected operation: LU Decomposition or Inverse matrix.
      java.lang.String displayVector(java.lang.String[] vec)
      Prepare vector from vector input TextArea to display in output TextArea.

      • Displayer

        public Displayer(Matrix toDisplay,
                 java.lang.String[] vector,
                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> vectorArray,

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        toDisplay - Matrix from matrix input TextArea.
        vector - Vector from vector input TextArea as array of Strings.
        vectorArray - Vector from vector input TextArea as ArrayList of Doubles.
        LUDisplay - Object to perform LU Decomposition and inverse matrix.

    • Method Detail

      • displaySolution

        public java.lang.String displaySolution(int operation)
        Display solution in results TextArea of selected operation: LU Decomposition or Inverse matrix.
        Parameters:
        operation - Takes values: 1 for LU Decomposition, 2 for Inverse matrix.
        Returns:
        String with solution of LU Decomposition or Inverse matrix.

      • displayVector

        Prepare vector from vector input TextArea to display in output TextArea.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Vector prepared to display in output TextArea.
